00053 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, double red, double green, double blue)
00054     :   x_(x), y_(y), red_(red), green_(green), blue_(blue), isForeground_(true), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_RGB)
00055 {

00073 Pixel::Pixel(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, bool isForeground)
00074     :   x_(x), y_(y), isForeground_(isForeground), colorspace_(COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC)
00075 {
00076     if ( isForeground )
00077     {
00078         grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00079         red_ = 0.0;
00080         green_ = 0.0;
00081         blue_ = 0.0;
00082     }
00083     else
00084     {
00085         grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00086         red_ = 1.0;
00087         green_ = 1.0;
00088         blue_ = 1.0;
00089     }
00090 };

00155 void Pixel::grayLevel (double grayLevel)
00156 {
00157     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_GRAYSCALE )
00158     {
00159         if ( grayLevel < 0.0 )
00160             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00161         else
00162         {
00163             if ( grayLevel > 1.0 )
00164                 grayLevel = 1.0;
00165             else
00166                 grayLevel_ = grayLevel;
00167         }
00168         
00169         isForeground_ = true;
00170         red_ = 0.0;
00171         green_ = 0.0;
00172         blue_ = 0.0;
00173     }
00174 };

00183 void Pixel::red (double value)
00184 {
00185     if ( value < 0.0 )
00186         red_ = 0.0;
00187     else
00188     {
00189         if ( value > 1.0 )
00190             red_ = 1.0;
00191         else
00192             red_ = value;
00193     }
00194 
00195     // Compute the grayscale equivalent value
00196     grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00197 };

00292 void Pixel::setColor (double red, double green, double blue)
00293 {
00294     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_RGB )
00295     {
00296         if ( red < 0.0 )
00297             red_ = 0.0;
00298         else
00299         {
00300             if ( red > 1.0 )
00301                 red_ = 1.0;
00302             else
00303                 red_ = red;
00304         }
00305         
00306         if ( green < 0.0 )
00307             green_ = 0.0;
00308         else
00309         {
00310             if ( green > 1.0 )
00311                 green_ = 1.0;
00312             else
00313                 green_ = green;
00314         }
00315         
00316         if ( blue < 0.0 )
00317             blue_ = 0.0;
00318         else
00319         {
00320             if ( blue > 1.0 )
00321                 blue_ = 1.0;
00322             else
00323                 blue_ = blue;
00324         }
00325         
00326         // Set the other representations
00327         grayLevel_ = (0.3 * red_) + (0.59 * green_) + (0.11 * blue_);
00328         isForeground_ = true;
00329     }
00330 };

00359 void Pixel::isForeground (bool isForeground)
00360 {
00361     if ( colorspace_ == COLORSPACE_MONOCHROMATIC )
00362     {
00363         isForeground_ = isForeground;
00364         
00365         if ( isForeground_ )
00366         {
00367             grayLevel_ = 0.0;
00368             red_ = 0.0;
00369             green_ = 0.0;
00370             blue_ = 0.0;
00371         }
00372         else
00373         {
00374             grayLevel_ = 1.0;
00375             red_ = 1.0;
00376             green_ = 1.0;
00377             blue_ = 1.0;
00378         }
00379     }
00380         
00381 };
